name: Fire Truck Frenzy
description:
A 6th to 8th grade student project developed in Bakersfield, CA

Welcome. We need your help. I am the cheif of the fire department and the mayor of this town, Spelt Dinkleweed. We need a new team of firefighters to save the town. There are a lot of disasters happening around here and I can't handle them all.  You will have to compete with multiple fire departments, to gain the name as the town's fire department. There will be hard times, it will more difficult every day, you will try to be the best. You will be able to chose the color of you firetruck.

I will help you along the way. So no fear Spelt Dinkleweed is here. Will you be able to save the kids at school or the patients at the hospital. Watch for animals and traffic. Now remember don't get in a accident.

#savedinkleville
